title: Messaging | Splits Network Platform
description: Real-time messaging built into every recruiting workflow. Threaded conversations attached to roles, candidates, and placements — no more lost email chains or disconnected communication.
author: Splits Network

blocks.subtitle: Real-time messaging built directly into the recruiting workflow. Communicate with hiring managers, coordinate with fellow recruiters, and keep candidates informed — all within the platform, all attached to the record that matters.
blocks.imageAlt: Messaging interface showing threaded conversation between recruiter and hiring manager about a candidate

blocks.heading: Recruiting Runs on Conversations That Get Lost
paragraphs: A hiring manager sends feedback on a candidate by email. The recruiter replies from their personal inbox. The candidate update happens in a text message. Three days later, nobody can reconstruct what was agreed.

Splits Network messaging keeps every conversation attached to the platform record it belongs to. When you discuss a candidate, the conversation lives on the candidate's profile. When you negotiate a role, that thread stays on the role. The context is always there when you need it.

blocks.heading: The Right Thread for Every Relationship
paragraphs: Different recruiting conversations require different contexts. The platform supports them all without mixing signals or breaking confidentiality.

items.title: Company-Recruiter Threads
items.body: Direct communication between hiring managers and the recruiters working their roles. Discuss role requirements, provide candidate feedback, align on interview scheduling — all in one place.

items.title: Recruiter-to-Recruiter
items.body: Coordinate split placements with other recruiters on the network. Share candidate context, align on submission strategy, and manage the handoff — privately and professionally.

items.title: Candidate Updates
items.body: Keep candidates informed at every stage. Send interview confirmations, status updates, and next steps directly through the platform. Every message is logged to the candidate record.

blocks.imageAlt: Messaging sidebar showing separate conversation threads by role, candidate, and recruiter

items.title: File Sharing
items.description: Attach resumes, job descriptions, interview guides, and offer letters directly to conversations. Files are stored with the thread — findable when you need them.

items.title: Notification Preferences
items.description: Control how and when you're notified. Configure in-app alerts, email digests, or real-time push notifications per conversation type.

items.title: Message Search
items.description: Search across all conversations by keyword, sender, role, or date range. Find the message you need without scrolling through weeks of threads.

items.title: Record-Linked Threads
items.description: Conversations automatically link to the role, candidate, or placement they relate to. Navigate directly from a message to the relevant record with one click.

items.title: Read Receipts
items.description: See when your messages have been read. Know whether a hiring manager has seen the candidate feedback you sent or whether a recruiter has acknowledged role updates.

items.title: Message History
items.description: Full conversation history is retained indefinitely. When a new team member joins a role, they have complete context from day one.

blocks.quote: I can't overstate how much the messaging feature has changed our operations. Every conversation about a candidate is right there on the candidate record. No more searching email for what was agreed.
blocks.citation: Simone Carter, Director of Recruiting Operations

cards.title: Hiring Companies
cards.description: Provide candidate feedback, share interview notes, and coordinate offers — all within the platform. No more managing recruiter relationships across separate email chains.

cards.title: Recruiters
cards.description: Stay coordinated with hiring managers without leaving the platform. Every conversation is logged, searchable, and connected to the role it belongs to.

cards.title: Split Partners
cards.description: Coordinate split placements with other recruiters efficiently. Share candidate context, agree on split terms, and manage the collaboration — all in a private thread.

items.question: Are messages between recruiters visible to companies?
items.answer: No. Recruiter-to-recruiter threads are private. Companies see only the conversations directly involving their roles and the recruiters communicating with them. Confidentiality between competing recruiters is maintained at the infrastructure level.

items.question: Can I message candidates directly through the platform?
items.answer: Yes. You can send messages to candidates associated with your submissions. All candidate communications are logged to the candidate record and visible in the conversation history.

items.question: Does messaging integrate with email?
items.answer: You can configure email notifications for new messages, ensuring you don't miss activity even when you're not logged in. Replies must be made within the platform to maintain the linked record structure.

items.question: Is there a message storage limit?
items.answer: There are no message storage limits on any plan. All conversation history is retained indefinitely. File attachment storage limits vary by plan — see pricing for details.

blocks.heading: Keep Every Conversation in Context
blocks.subtitle: Messaging is built into every Splits Network account. No setup, no separate tool, no lost threads.
